en.title: Mind Map
en.text_help_text_0: Click the "Add Node" button to add a node
en.text_help_text_1: To connect two nodes, enable "Connect" mode and click on two nodes
en.text_help_text_2: To move a node, drag it
en.text_help_text_3: To delete a node, click the Ã— button
